Triceradon, the maximals have not had their meeting yet, but they're still in 
the war room trying to solve a despute between Dinobot and Cyber Claw.

::Striker::

Striker growls. This was getting out of hand, rapidly.

"Enough!" he says, stepping forward and stopping near Dinobot, Cyber Claw, 
and Tavatron. He looks at the three, his optics level with Dinobot's.

Striker's shoulder blaster emerge, aiming at Dinobot and Cyber Claw, "I 
ordered both of you to take a step back. No one is leaving untill this is 
settled. WITHOUT violence," he adds, looking kinda hypocritical with two guns 
and two shoulder blasters aimed at the bots.

"Now, both of you take several steps back," he says sharply to the two bots, 
"And you transform," he orders, looking at Cyber Claw.
